title-group.article-title: Random Variable Generation Using Concavity Properties of Transformed Densities

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright 1998 American Statistical Association, Institute of Mathematical Statistics, and Interface Foundation of North America

abstract.p: Algorithms are developed for constructing random variable generators for families of densities. The generators depend on the concavity structure of a transformation of the density. The resulting algorithms are rejection algorithms and the methods of this article are concerned with constructing good rejection algorithms for general densities.
